solution_line_template: {burger_pounds} pounds of burgers at ${cost_per_pound_burger} per pound makes {burger_pounds}*{cost_per_pound_burger}=${total_burger_cost}>>{total_burger_cost}
In addition to ${condiments_propane_cost} for condiments and propane the total cost was {total_burger_cost}+{condiments_propane_cost}=${total_shared_cost}>>{total_shared_cost}
That means each of them paid {total_shared_cost}/{total_people_splitting_cost}=${cost_per_person}>>{cost_per_person}
Then adding in the cost of alcohol, John spent {alcohol_cost}+{cost_per_person}=${johns_total_spend}>>{johns_total_spend}
